content.content: Hi, I would like to know if anyone has attempted to encode websocket connections details using EIP-778 and if so, what keys they used? Keen to not re-invent the wheel if there are implementations out that there already looked at this issue. More context at EIP-1459/EIP-778 in a Browser environment - Research - Vac Kind regards, F
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking if anyone has attempted to encode websocket connections details using EIP-778 and if so, what keys they used. The author is looking for existing implementations to avoid reinventing the wheel.
